_header: He that had enough to help himself withall
_description: A couplet in Nicolas Bozon’s Contes moralisés

BLAdd46919.Transcription: He þat has ynouth til helpin him self wit alSithen he ne wolde for soche I ne schal
BLAdd46919.Note: Written as prose, introduced by “anglico” in text.

GraysInn12.Transcription:
He þat hadd I nou to help him self witalSithen he ne wold I ne
                    wile ne I ne schal
GraysInn12.Note: Written as prose, lines 4-3 from the bottom.
